raw_body: It is with deep regret that we announce the untimely demise of Mrs. M. Champa Balasuriya (54) Director, Department of Public Finance - Ministry of Finance. Join with her family members Mr. Premasiri Balasuriya (Husband - HDFC Bank), Rajini Balasuriya and Nilasi Balasuriya (daughters), Dotti Illeperuma (Mother), Ms. Kanthi Perera (sister), Ms. Ganga Perera (Sister) and Mr. Priyashantha Perera (brother) as they mourn the loss of their loved one.
